document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Obtaining </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">own </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">extent </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">whatsoever </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Realm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Twas </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Christ's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">own </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">personal </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">Expanse </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">bore </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">him </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">Tomb </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Obtaining but our own extent
